page.title: 19Church of England in Clun
page.content: There are 3 Sunday services which are the Holy Communion at 08.00, Matins or Holy Communion at 09.45 Evensong at 18.30. All these services together have a total attendance of between 60/70. There are about 120 church members on roll. The estimate of the running costs of the church is Â£12500 per annum including Â£4500 towards the vicar's stipend leaving Â£8000 running costs. Money is raised by church collections and other methods like subscriptions, Christmas Bazaar, Sunday cream teas, bring & buy sales and visitors' gifts. There is also a reserve fund in the bank bringing in interest. The incumbent is the Vicar of St George's Church, Clun. He is responsible for all services and preaching in this church.
